description: Here's what you might have missed Thursday on CNN.
title: Quickly catch up on the day's news
title_page: News today: ER doctor, Tiger King, Anthony Fauci - CNN
maintext:
(CNN) Here's what you might have missed Thursday on CNN:
-- Experts tell the White House that coronavirus can spread through talking or even just breathing.
-- The nation's top coronavirus expert, Dr. Anthony Fauci, is forced to beef up security as death threats against him increase.
-- An emergency room doctor died in his husband's arms a week after contracting coronavirus.
-- A healthy 39-year-old DJ died of coronavirus. What his young widow and daughter want you to know.
-- The mayor of Topeka, Kansas, has a mission: Convince the residents of her medium-sized, Midwestern city who have not been touched by the coronavirus pandemic that this is their fight, too.
-- "Doc" Antle and Jeff Lowe from Netflix's popular "Tiger King" docuseries speak out against it.
